'''Katie Jackson''' (born [[1996]]) is a New Zealand actress, the daughter of [[Peter Jackson]] and [[Fran Walsh]], and the sister of [[Billy Jackson]] and has cameos in her parent's productions. 

She portrayed a Cute [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] Child listening to Biblo's stories during the Party scene, a Cute [[Rohan]] Refugee Child hidden in the [[Glittering Caves]] during the [[Battle of the Hornburg]], and a [[Gondor]]ian Child during the [[Siege of Gondor]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|The Lord of the Rings]]'' trilogy.

A decade later she returned for ''[[The Hobbit (film series)|The Hobbit]]'' trilogy, portraying a Cute Young Hobbit in [[the Shire]], [[Betsy Butterbur]] in ''[[The Prancing Pony]]'', and a Woman in [[Lake-town]].<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.imdb.com/name/nm1116175/|articlename=Katie Jackson|dated=|website=[http://www.imdb.com IMDb]|accessed=11 July 2019}}</ref>

==Roles==
* [[2001]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' -  Hobbit Child
* [[2002]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]'' - Rohan Refugee Child
* [[2003]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'' - Child
* [[2012]]: ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]'' - Young Hobbit (Extended Edition only)
* [[2013]]: ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]'' - [[Betsy Butterbur]]
* [[2014]]: ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]'' - Girl in [[Lake-town]] (uncredited)
